programme.desc: Greener Pastures explores the people who have left home to find better opportunities in a new country. Why did they want to go? Is it worth leaving everything behind? What challenges do they face? How will their hopes, dreams and realities come together?

programme.title: The Law Cafe - EP 11
programme.desc: (Dual language Mandarin and Korean) A bright and quirky lawyer wants to open a cafe that offers free legal advice; the cafe she wants is owned by her wealthy and well-connected first love; she must stand having her ex as her landlord long enough to get her cafe off the ground.

programme.title: VIP - EP 13
programme.desc: (Dual language Mandarin and Thai)

programme.title: The Secret House - EP 56
programme.desc: (Dual language Mandarin and Korean) Nan Taiheng arranges to meet Li Dongzhe and gives him 100 million as hush money, telling him to collect the remaining payment after one month. Li Dongzhe believes it and happily takes the money to a casino to gamble, almost getting caught.

programme.title: The Secret House - EP 57
programme.desc: (Dual language Mandarin and Korean) Yu Zhihuan knows about Nan Taiheng and Li Dongzhe’s relationship and plans to reveal it, causing Nan Taiheng to seek help from his mother. He also suspects his father’s will is fake and wants to verify the handwriting.

programme.title: Taiwan's 1001 Stories S10 - EP 4
programme.desc: This programme introduces to viewers Taiwan's popular eateries, restaurants and its moving stories.

programme.title: A Journey to Love - EP 37
programme.desc: Ning Yuanzhou and Ren Ruyi learn of Northern Pan’s attack on He County and suspect the involvement of the Second Prince and Li Sun. To prevent war from spreading across the An, Wu, and the Central Plains, they rush to An’s capital, despite their injuries, to force Li Sun to act.

programme.title: News Tonight - EP 88

programme.desc: 15 years ago, Jenar found himself in a tragic event that claimed the lives of his family. Mila, who is Jenar's older sister, is still alive after Ayu's adoption. Jenar's life changes after meeting Mirza, a man who is attracted to her.

programme.title: Perawat Cinta Cantiknya Gak Ada Obat
programme.desc: Dimas (Kenny Austin) has just been in a single car accident that resulted in a broken leg bone. At that time there was an ambulance that swiftly helped Dimas and the nurse was named Luna (Larasati Nugroho). At the hospital, Dimas' mother wants Luna to take care of Dimas until he recovers.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 324
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: Love Story The Series S2 - EP 309
programme.desc: Kendra's meeting with Maudy began with an accidental meeting at the Villa, that's where Ken first saw Maudy and immediately fell in love. At first Maudy was disturbed by Ken's presence, the horse Maudy was riding accidentally got angry and fell into the river, not long after Ken jumped to save Maudy.

programme.title: Neng Urut Senyummu Emang Paling Kyut
programme.desc: Bondan was fired from his job. On the way home, Bondan rode his motorcycle while stupefied until he fell off the motorcycle. When he got home, his mother told Bondan to get a massage. While Bondan was sleeping, Seruni secretly massaged Bondan's feet.

programme.title: Jesnita - EP 15

programme.title: Malaysian Ghost Stories S2 - EP 12

programme.title: Aku Bukan BIMBO - EP 4

programme.title: Movie - Megha - EP 1
programme.desc: Mugilan, a forensic expert, uncovers that officer Joseph murdered his colleague for a promotion. When Joseph accuses Mugilan of raping his missing lover, he must find her to clear his name.

programme.title: Movie - Haridas - EP 1
programme.desc: Sivadas, a valiant officer, neglects Haridas, his child who has autism, due to his profession. Guilty, he decides to make up for his mistakes and do something for his son.

programme.title: Movie - Agent Sai Srinivasa Athreya - EP 1
programme.desc: A private detective, who runs his own agency, solves menial cases with the help of his assistant. However, things take a serious turn when a father wants him to investigate his daughter's murder.

programme.title: Movie - Goli Soda - EP 1
programme.desc: Four adolescent boys fall prey of a baddie and things turn ugly.

programme.title: Movie - Podhuvaga Emmanasu Thangam - EP 1
programme.desc: Podhuvaga Em Manasu Thangam is a 2017 Indian Tamil-language comedy film written and directed by Thalapathy Prabhu, starring Udhayanidhi Stalin and Nivetha Pethuraj, with Parthiepan and Soori in supporting roles.

programme.title: Movie - Ennakul Oruvan - EP 1
programme.desc: A man suffering from insomnia is tricked into buying a drug, Lucia, that makes his desires come true in his dreams, blurring the line between fantasy and reality.

programme.title: Movie - Ithu Kathirvelan Kadhal - EP 1
programme.desc: Kathir, who despises marriage, travels to Coimbatore to settle a family dispute. There, he falls for Pavithra, only to have his heart broken when he learns she loves someone else.

programme.title: Movie - Maniyar Kudumbam - EP 1
programme.desc: About the rise and fall of a family narrated in comical manner.

programme.title: Movie - Sowkarpettai - EP 1
programme.desc: Driven by vengeance, spectral lovers return from the afterlife to haunt and punish the villains responsible for their untimely demise in a spectral reckoning.

programme.title: Movie - Yaan - EP 1

programme.title: Movie - Ko2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Kumaran, an ordinary citizen, abducts Tamil Nadu's chief minister, leaving the nation puzzled over what drove him to take such a drastic step.

programme.title: Movie - Kaviya Thalaivan - EP 1

programme.title: Movie - Jaihind 2 - EP 1

programme.title: Movie - Kattapa Kanoam - EP 1

programme.title: Movie - Maplasingam - EP 1

programme.title: Movie - Vellakara Durai - EP 1

programme.title: Tandem - EP 11
programme.desc: A body has been found in a state-owned forest, head and hands severed and burned. The victim being impossible to identify, Franck, the pathologist, visits the murder scene. The weapon used, discovered in the remains of the fire, is a tool used by foresters, lumberjacks and forest rangers.

programme.title: Tandem - EP 12
programme.desc: The investigation into the body found in the forest, head and hands severed and burned, takes a new turn. Franck, the pathologist, has disappeared after learning that his sister Zoe, a forest ranger, has been kidnapped. The search now concentrates on Zoe's laptop that has just been located.

programme.desc: Domesticated 10,500 years ago in Mesopotamia, the wild auroch has since vanished from the surface of the Earth. programme.title: Rocky Et Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 93
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Kididoc - EP 3
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans Ca - EP 31
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Les Nouvelles Aventures De Kaeloo - EP 15
programme.desc: In Super-Cute-Land, Kaeloo, Stumpy, Quack-Quack and Mr. Cat play a new game every day. And for that they love nothing better than making up their own rules and asking loads of questions about the world around them: with this lot you can never be sure of what will happen next!

programme.title: Tobie Lolness - EP 5
programme.desc: A prisoner, Tobie is locked up in the Crater, at the mercy of a cruel and stupid character: Rolok toilet. Tobie finds a way to escape, but returns to the Crater to save Mano.

programme.title: Le Gout Des Rencontres En Nouvelle-Aquitaine - EP 16
programme.desc: Exploring rural land and culinary traditions! Chef Justine Piluso criss-crosses Nouvelle-Aquitaine to meet men and women in the region to learn about their products, their tastes and the dishes that they prepare.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Brillantes
programme.desc: Karine, works nights as a cleaner and is a single mother to 17 year-old Ziggy. The day her company is taken over, her life turns upside down. Social pressure forces her into a corner, threatening her with an impossible choice: reveal a secret or lie to protect herself?

programme.title: L'americain
programme.desc: To stave off boredom and make himself the centre of attention, Malik tells three local youngsters that he's leaving to live in the USA. It isn't true, but once the news has spread around the neighbourhood, he becomes a symbol of hope and pride for everyone.

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire - EP 22
programme.desc: Anemone is surprised to learn that Lise is at Karla's beside. Is it time to mend the bridges with her best friend? She also makes a move towards Sophie, who she sees in a very different light since the revelations made by the latter.

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire - EP 23
programme.desc: Vincent confides in Maryse, telling her that he has good reason not to trust Anemone. Meanwhile, completely unawares, the latter takes the risk of making a major step forwards... towards her past. Simon asks Naelle the big question, but nothing goes quite as planned.

programme.title: Ethique Helvetique - EP 3
programme.desc: What shaped Swiss thought? By analysing the history of the country, Tristan Miquel and Julien Girardin question the ethical and philosophical challenges facing their society and draw up parallels between the past and the present to stimulate reflection on different schools of thought.

programme.title: Un Soir Au Music-Hall (Folies Bergere)
programme.desc: Bob, a GI on leave in Paris, falls in love with Claudie, dancer at the famous cabaret the Folies Bergere. He marries her, settles in Paris and begins a singing career. But as one concert tour follows another, it doesn't take long for jealousy to rear its ugly head...

programme.title: Ya Benti
programme.desc: Sabrina, lesbian, is about to marry Younes, her childhood friend, who is also gay. A marriage that suits both of them because it reassures and delights their families. But on the eve of the ceremony, Sabrina begins to have doubts.

programme.title: Le Chasseur De Baleines

programme.title: Movie - Billa II
programme.desc: David Billa works for Abbasi, a famous mobster in Goa. Due to a difference of opinion, Abbasi turns against David, and eventually gets killed by him. David must handle the situation carefully.

programme.title: Movie - Anwar
programme.desc: Anwar, a middle-class Muslim, falls in love with Mehru, a Hindu girl. Post her death, he is caught by the police and a misunderstanding leads them to believe that he is a terrorist.

programme.title: Movie - Eesa
programme.desc: The story revolves around the lives of saltpan workers. One of the workers decides to revolt against his employers when his family is destroyed due to their oppressive and cruel ways.

programme.title: Movie - Sakthi
programme.desc: After Sakthi foils Sethupati's attempt to steal the temple idols and jewels, he begins to guard the temple himself. He also learns that Sita, a woman ostracised by the village, is actually his mother.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Sindhunathi Poo
programme.desc: When Valli learns of her husband Chettiar's affair with her sister, she commits suicide. Thirukkaval, her son, vows to take revenge on Chettiar.

programme.title: Movie - Chinnavar
programme.desc: Muthu and Veerasamy are best friends and fishermen, and Veerasamy's sister Meena loves Muthu. When a rich man asks for Veerasamy's permission to marry Meena, she claims to have already married Muthu.

programme.title: Movie - Sigappu Rojakkal
programme.desc: Finding it hard to put his dark past behind him, Samar grows to despise girls and indulges in women trafficking. Arrested and put in an asylum by the police, he falls for a demented lady prisoner.

programme.title: Movie - Azhahi
programme.desc: A veterinarian recalls his childhood days when he fell in love with a girl who studied with him at school.

programme.title: Movie - Engal Aasan
programme.desc: A bank officer is transferred to a village branch to investigate possible fraud. When he seeks to retrieve a wrongfully issued 250 million rupee loan, the criminal responsible gets his goons to burn down the bank.

programme.title: Movie - Vellai Yaanai
programme.desc: Vellai is a farmer from an economically self-sufficient village. But when he and the villagers take a bank's crop loan, they get caught in debt due to drought and low prices for crops. A few desperate farmers migrate to the city in search of a job. Can they pay off their debt?

programme.title: Movie - Pudhu Kudithanam
programme.desc: Ashok is a very obedient son, and his mother would like an equally submissive daughter-in-law so that she does not influence him. But Ashok secretly marries Nila, who actually dislikes this situation.

programme.title: Movie - January 1st
programme.desc: When a series of mysterious murders rock the city, a courageous inspector, Mano, sets out to capture the culprit and restore order.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Kadhal (Telugu Dubbed)
programme.desc: Vikram falls in love with different women at various stages of his life and with each experience, he bears the pain and emotions of separation.

programme.title: Movie - Vanna Vanna Pookal
programme.desc: Siva saves a girl from committing suicide and ends up falling in love with her, much to the chagrin of his neighbour Shenbagam, who secretly is in love with him.

programme.title: Movie - Pagal Nilavu
programme.desc: Selvam is indebted to Devarajan, a big shot in town, for saving his mother. When he falls in love with the sister of the new police inspector, Devarajan plans to make good use of the situation.

programme.title: Movie - Harichandra (New)
programme.desc: Hari, a compulsive liar, falls in love with Nandini, an honest school principal. Though she accepts him for who he is, his habit of lying creates problems in their relationship.

programme.title: Movie - Aayirathil Oruvan (New)
programme.desc: Chandramouli, a famous archeologist, goes missing while on a research expedition. Anitha, a government officer, and Lavanya, Chandramouli's daughter, embark on an adventurous journey to find him.

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025
programme.desc: The Bad Homburg Open is a women's professional tennis tournament held on outdoor grass courts at the Bad Homburg Tennis Club in Bad Homburg, Germany. The town is known for champaign air. 32 singles players will battle it out for the prize purse of $1,064,510. The Bad Homburg Open powered by Solarwatt is the last 500-tier event before Wimbledon.

programme.desc: The 2025 Billie Jean King Cup Qualifiers are being played as 6 groups of 3 nations as the Billie Jean King Cup Finals transit from a 12-team event to an 8 team event in 2025, mirroring the existing Davis Cup Final 8 format. Each 3 day qualifiers group event will be held in one location and played on a round-robin basis. The 6 group winners will join hosts China, and 2024 world champions Italy in the 2025 Finals in Shenzhen.

programme.desc: The Italian Open is the men's national open golf championship of Italy. It was founded in 1925. The format of the Italian Open is a standard stroke play event played over 72 holes with a cut after 36 holes. programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 4
programme.desc: We sit down with ex-Premier League referee Howard Webb, to talk about his early days as a South Yorkshire policeman to becoming one of the most respected referees in world football. In this candid interview Webb shares stories of his rise through the Premier League ranks, culminating in the honour of refereeing the 2010 FIFA World Cup Final. Along the way, he shares the challenges, pressures, and defining moments of a career spent making the game's toughest calls on the biggest stages.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 3
programme.desc: We celebrate the greatest goalscorers in Premier League history; the icons whose instinct, power, and flair have lit up stadiums and etched their names into footballing folklore. From Alan Shearer's relentless consistency to Thierry Henry's elegance, Sergio Aguero's killer instinct to Harry Kane's rise, we relive the moments that defined an era.

programme.desc: A curated collection of the most iconic Timeless moments from past shows, featuring the game's top legends.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 50
programme.desc: We follow New Zealand striker Chris Wood during a crucial World Cup Qualifier on home soil, at the peak of one of the most impressive seasons of his career. Back in his hometown, we meet the family, coaches and friends who helped shape the player and the person he's become. From humble beginnings to Premier League mainstay, Wood reflects on the pressures he's faced, the pride of leading his country, and the mindset that's driven him every step of the way.

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2013/2014 (MNC)
programme.desc: A review of all the best goals, action and drama from Premier League seasons past.

programme.title: Classic Match
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2013/2014 season.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Cheyanne Vlismas vs. Karolina Wojcik
programme.desc: This episode features a Fight of the Night contest between strawweights Cheyanne 'The Warrior Princess' Vlismas and Karolina 'The Polish Assassin' Wojcik, both making their debut. This was a 3-round war with one fighter taking home the split decision victory. Bonus coverage includes Rodrique Kena vs. Sifiso Ngcobo.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Sergio Martinez vs. Paul Williams I
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features middleweights Sergio 'Maravilla' Martinez (44-1, 24 KOs) vs. Paul 'The Punisher' Williams (37-1, 27 KOs) from Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA, on December 5, 2009. The result was a controversial majority decision, and the two would eventually square off in a rematch about a year later.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode, we see the best of the Judo Grand Prix from Dusseldorf and head to Peru to witness different forms of Judo.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Amir Khan vs. Danny Garcia
programme.desc: This episode features a Light Welterweight title bout between the unbeaten Danny Garcia and #1 contender Amir Khan, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Danny Garcia vs. Erik Morales
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Danny Garcia looking to win the WBC super lightweight championship when he squares off with Erik Morales, but Garcia must battle back after suffering a nose injury early on. Also on the card, former world champions Hector Camacho and Adonis Stevenson.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 5 from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan features Takakeisho, Hokutofuji, Terunofuji and Shimanoumi.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Fukuoka, Japan welcomes the top talent in the world of martial arts when Karate 1 Premier League returns. Fukuoka will host athletes from across the globe including last season's Grand Winners such as Hikaru Ono and Ayaka Saito competing in their home country. The World Karate Federation expects another tremendous turnout, featuring Olympic medalists and world-ranked competitors, when the Karate 1 Premier League visits the port city of Fukuoka, Japan, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Bipolar Rock n' Roller
programme.desc: A raw and unflinching account of Mauro Ranallo's decades-long struggle with Bipolar Affective Disorder. The voice of WWE and Showtime Championship Boxing, Ranallo has called some of the biggest sports events in history - all the while fighting his own epic battles with mental health Follow his journey in this 3-part series, as he combats the stigma behind mental health issues and sheds light on what it's like being at the top of the industry despite seemingly insurmountable odds.

An 11th round knockout decided this bout between 2 of the top 4 contenders in the deep middleweight class.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode we look at different weapons used throughout the martial arts and the technology used to make them stronger and more efficient.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Andre Berto vs. Luis Collazo
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Andre Berto defending the WBC welterweight title against former WBA champion Luis Collazo. Each fighter had their own share of getting stunned throughout the bout, and the judges' decision at the end will have some controversy. Also on the card, kickboxing takes center stage as super heavyweight legend Daniel Ghita takes on Gokhan Saki.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 2, from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan, features Terunofuji, Meisei, Kiribayama and Mitakeumi

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode, we see the best of the Judo Grand Slam from Baku and the #2 world ranked fighter, Michael Korrell, talks judo.

programme.title: Bipolar Rock n' Roller
programme.desc: A raw and unflinching account of Mauro Ranallo's decades-long struggle with Bipolar Affective Disorder. The voice of WWE and Showtime Championship Boxing, Ranallo has called some of the biggest sports events in history - all the while fighting his own epic battles with mental health Follow his journey in this 3-part series, as he combats the stigma behind mental health issues and sheds light on what it's like being at the top of the industry despite seemingly insurmountable odds.

programme.desc: To bring peace to his kingdom, King Julien "civilizes" a Foosa.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: Tom and D’Angelo must come together to help Alex and Jun escape the clutches of the Spiderwings.

programme.desc: The gang learns of even bigger and direr forces working against the Empress and the Kingdom of China, and must come up with a plan to put a stop to it before it is too late.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S1 - EP 14
programme.desc: Waldo and Wenda travel to Tokyo for a Manga festival and meet up with Koichi, fellow Wanderer and Go Hero Go fan. But when Fritz is accidentally zapped by the Mega Mega Monster key, he grows to the size of Godzilla and tries to eat all the noodles in the city. The wanderers must stop him and get the key back.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: You Oughta Be in Pictures When Mantha sees a Deedstown mob attacking a group of fellow zombies, she's determined to lead them in a counterattack. Crypt Critters Mantha comes down with an embarrassing case of crypt critters, but refuses to go to the nurse.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 - EP 24
programme.desc: Armed with a brand new sat-nav from Fuse, the Pirates head off on The Pirate Challenge, sailing all around Toyland. But when they fail to arrive at their first stop in Toy Green, Noddy investigates what's happened. He must set the Pirates back on course to complete the challenge by the end of the day.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo is having a banana party. Raa Raa and the others have picked masses of lovely bananas, but how are they going to transport them back to Ooo Ooo's in time for the party?

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 - EP 21
programme.desc: Mimi has lost the handle to her music box and can't hear her music. Jess works out how to make instruments and get all the friends involved in making a little orchestra and performing a fantastic song to cheer mimi up.

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: Jess helps Mimi to find her little frend Sammy Snail who's gone missing. They check all the places she's seen him before and work out that if they follow the silvery train it leads right to him.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Kelp and Pixie forget about their little sisters and their plans to hang out. Scallop goes to Unicorn Land and meets Juniper. They play and become friends. / The unicorns are eager to play with a new mystery item that washes up on the beach, but what is it? While the other unicorns come up with imaginative ideas of what it could be, Pixie is determined to find out exactly what it is.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Burple gets spooked by the legend of a ghost called the Phantom Fang. But when he senses the story is real, he can't get his friends to believe him.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 14
programme.desc: In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 - EP 20
programme.desc: The Mad Scientist turns out to be an ally called Akna, who has a history with Blade's brother Alfie. And Blade learns another truth about her brother and his mission. And in the course of a skirmish with Klaus and Veruca, the weapons change hands again.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 62
programme.desc: Boss Baby and Tina reject the 5%er system that says the cuter you are, the more love you deserve. Teaming up with the Uncuddleables, the team tries to take down the system from within, forming a resistance of the eight department heads of Baby Corp in the hopes of changing the way we look at Baby Love forever.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: It’s Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. programme.title: Getting Even With Dad
programme.desc: When he is dropped off at the home of Ray Gleeson (Ted Danson), the father he hasn't seen in years, Timmy (Macaulay Culkin) hopes that they'll be able to spend some time together. But, unfortunately, Dad and his two klutzy cohorts are too busy with a get-rich-quick scheme, illegally paving the road to financial bliss...that is, until Timmy steps into their path. Recognizing that only he can set his father straight, this inventive kid puts an end to their plans and makes Ray do time...as a dad!

programme.title: How To Train Your Dragon 2
programme.desc: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

programme.title: Platoon
programme.desc: Dealing with the day-to-day existence of an infantry rifle platoon of thirty guys from all walks of life, PLATOON examines the fight between good and evil and what it was really like to be a foot soldier.

programme.title: The Lovely Bones
programme.desc: When 14-year-old Susie Salmon was murdered, she left her unfinished life behind. But now from her place in a strange but beautiful in-between world, she must help her father catch her killer and protect her family before she can finally move on. Filled with thrilling suspense, hope and the redeeming power of love.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Italian Dream Home (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: What was once a barn is now being transformed into a fully-fledged music hall! Rachael's husband John is a musician, and entertaining their guests will be on the menu.

programme.title: Airline Wars - EP 3
programme.desc: A cancelled flight to a dream vacation sends a mother over the edge. A pilot has no choice but to restrain an allegedly intoxicated man. Reports of gunshots at JFK causes complete pandemonium.

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork - EP 2
programme.desc: Buddy visits two generational legacies - family owned and operated Patsy's Italian Restaurant in New York City and the famed Oaxacan joint in Los Angeles, Guelaguetza.

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork - EP 4
programme.desc: Buddy heads to two restaurants that are known as much for their Hollywood connection, as they are for serving delicious food. The Victor Cafe in Philadelphia and El Coyote, a Hollywood stomping ground.

programme.title: Best In Chow - EP 7
programme.desc: Host Matt Richards goes to the Wisconsin State Fair to find the best savoury, sweet, and wild card dishes.

programme.title: Best In Chow - EP 10
programme.desc: Host Matt Richards goes to the 626 Night Market in Arcadia, CA to find the best savoury, sweet and wildcard dishes.

programme.title: Robin Roberts Presents I Will Survive: The Gloria Gaynor Story
programme.desc: The film chronicles Gaynor's rise to fame, from her humble beginnings to becoming one of the most iconic voices in music history. The biopic will also delve into the personal challenges Gaynor faced.

programme.title: The Podcast Murders

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Europe Early Edition
programme.desc: Start your trading day with Europe Early Edition as major European financial centres take the reins of global markets. Get the first indication of how markets in Europe will react to an active Asian session and the handover from the US. programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.desc: Discover London uncovers hidden gems, guided by an experienced London Black Taxi driver and respected 'Knowledge of London' tutor, and a youthful Londoner seeking to learn more about her city.

programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Tough Trains

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Luxe Asia S2
programme.desc: Each episode focuses on a particular theme, be it homes, holidays or toys of the super-wealthy. It's Asia like you've never seen before - dripping in grandeur and extravagance, ready for anyone with deep enough pockets. Join host Anita Kapoor on a journey across the beautiful Asian continent, exploring the latest in luxury in Hong Kong, Sri Lanka, the Maldives, Singapore, Thailand, China, and Abu Dhabi.

programme.desc: Indy Barends wants to share stories with his inspirational friends that can motivate people to be successful.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S2
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: Coastal Life
programme.desc: Coastal communities are communities that generally make a living by utilizing the sea and its contents. The challenges of life facing the sea provide unique socio-economic characteristics to coastal communities. Coastal Life talks about the lives of coastal communities in Indonesia in general. The topics of each episode include culture, harsh life, livelihoods, problems often faced, and how they survive admist the offers of modernity.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Luxe Asia S2
programme.desc: Each episode focuses on a particular theme, be it homes, holidays or toys of the super-wealthy. It's Asia like you've never seen before - dripping in grandeur and extravagance, ready for anyone with deep enough pockets. Join host Anita Kapoor on a journey across the beautiful Asian continent, exploring the latest in luxury in Hong Kong, Sri Lanka, the Maldives, Singapore, Thailand, China, and Abu Dhabi.

programme.title: Teman Bicara
programme.desc: Indy Barends wants to share stories with his inspirational friends that can motivate people to be successful.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S2
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy
programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: Beyond The Barn
programme.desc: Beyond The Barn wants the program to invite the audience to look beyond traditional livestock farming, by highlighting the business potential that can be generated. For example, cowhide produced from the farm can be used as raw material for leather shoes, showing how creativity can turn agricultural or livestock products into profitable businesses.

programme.title: Wild Cage
programme.desc: Indonesia's wildlife is incredibly diverse, with a variety of unique and spectacular wildlife living in Indonesia. Indonesia is home to many endemic species, and the existence of these endemic species is very important and part of our identity, as all creatures play an important role in maintaining the balance of Indonesia's wild ecosystems.

programme.title: Coastal Life
programme.desc: Coastal communities are communities that generally make a living by utilizing the sea and its contents. The challenges of life facing the sea provide unique socio-economic characteristics to coastal communities. Coastal Life talks about the lives of coastal communities in Indonesia in general. The topics of each episode include culture, harsh life, livelihoods, problems often faced, and how they survive admist the offers of modernity.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: 2-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 2 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 3 - 5 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: The Travel Note
programme.desc: The Travel Note is a light travel program that discusses about tourist attractions, which includes history, culture, variety culinary there and also the comfortable and affordable hotel. Presented by a young, attractive and dynamic host._x000D_The Travel Note also provides some tips and tricks to the audiences.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: Documentary series about the lives of rescue animals in animal shelters. The sad and dark stories of animals that have to end up in shelters, the struggles of protectors of abandoned animals, the behavior of animals that are sometimes funny and sometimes chaotic, to the happy stories of those who finally have new homes and parents.

programme.title: Wild Cage
programme.desc: Indonesia's wildlife is incredibly diverse, with a variety of unique and spectacular wildlife living in Indonesia. Indonesia is home to many endemic species, and the existence of these endemic species is very important and part of our identity, as all creatures play an important role in maintaining the balance of Indonesia's wild ecosystems.

programme.title: The Animal Library
programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: K9 Mounties
programme.desc: When the Royal Canadian Mountain Police Force are in search of a missing person they call in the help of an elite group. The K9 Mounties are rigorously trained to be able to locate those in need in the hardest to reach places.

programme.title: Apose Bos Baru
programme.desc: After the drama of losing his job, Andre tries to return to being Surya's assistant. But this time, he has to go through a probation period. Meanwhile, Dicky also loses his job due to a scandal. Now the vacant CEO position is filled by an unexpected figure, Ayu Ting Ting.

programme.title: Buddy Talk
programme.desc: Buddy Talk is one of our flagship programs which combines quick news headlines, talkshow, digital trends, sports, lifestyle, and entertainment news.

programme.title: Sport's Tale
programme.desc: Apart from being competitive, there are still many unique stories behind sports. The philosophy of sports club logos, to how much money is needed for a racing event, is discussed in this program.

programme.title: Beyond The Limit
programme.desc: Stories of young people who have pursued their dreams from an early age.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. programme.desc: This is a story based on the lives of Yanase Takashi (Kitamura Takumi), the creator of "Anpanman," a famous Japanese anime character, and his wife Nobu (Imada Mio). programme.title: Koh Kentetsu's Food Travelogue in Japan: Osaka Prefecture (R)
programme.desc: Culinary personality Koh Kentetsu travels around Japan, in search of fine foods worth preserving for the next 100 years. This time, the spotlight is on Osaka - buzzing with excitement for the upcoming Expo! Along the way, he discovers the meat of the future unveiled at the Expo, and explores Osaka’s evolving food culture - from uniquely local kimchi and aged kombu to an artisan farmer’s premium chrysanthemum greens.

programme.desc: Yamaguchi Narumi (Ayase Haruka) enjoys her single life. However, the solitary death of her admired aunt, a dedicated career woman, compels her to hastily pursue marriage-only to fail. This prompts Narumi to make a drastic shift from "marriage hunting" to desperately exploring "end-of-life planning."

programme.title: Samurai Drama "Keijiro's Diary 3" Eps. 9 (R)
programme.desc: The third season of "Keijiro's Diary," well-received from 2004 to 2007, is coming back for a rebroadcast. Six years have passed since Moriguchi Keijiro, a retired constable at the magistrate’s office, became the caretaker of a merchant's dormitory in Negishi. Keijiro feels the passage of time since losing his daughter, Michiyo, in a tragic incident before her wedding. Despite this, he continues to resolve consultations, spending his days close to people's hearts.

programme.desc: A real-life working travel show, each trip is led by Dou Zhikong and Wang Chuan-yi, who are composed of a "handsome working group" of artist guests. They travel together to get away from the hustle and bustle of the city and explore the most healing rural secrets.

programme.title: Dee Girls Talk - EP 292
programme.desc: Hosted by Dee Hsu, the most queenly artist in the entertainment industry, and partnered with the humorous assistant host Patrick, each episode invites many of the most popular and topical artists and Internet celebrities to appear on the show. programme.title: Made In Taiwan

programme.title: KUNG FU MASTER, THE - EP 3
programme.desc: During the Ching Dynasty under the throne of Hong Hei, there was a `Kung Fu Contest`, once the sensation of the martial world. NGAU FEI (KWOK JING HUNG) represents the Manchu tribe while TAM TIN (YUEN WAH) represents the Han Tribe. The balance of power was destroyed when TIN was being set up during the competition. TIN lost in the contest. TIN`s father was so irritated that he died throwing up blood. Since then TIN is very depressed and pessimistic. He becomes a coward.

programme.title: Fly With Me - EP 22
programme.desc: LEUNG HAU-CHI (Choi Siu Fun, Ada), a career woman in her 30s, has all the attributes of a typical Hong Kong girl - fussy, arrogant and easily irritated by the sight of beautiful young ladies. She is desperate for love and has been eagerly waiting for the thrilling miracles of life. As CHI is plunged into misery and despair, something strange happens and leads to her abrupt transformation into a superwoman of charm and immense strength.

programme.title: Stranger Anniversary - EP 11
programme.desc: A "doppelgangers" website has facilitated the connection between two complete strangers that look like identical twins. Law firm partner Ko Sau-shing (Joe Ma) tracks down his former lover Yu Fung (Roxanne Tong), whom he has not contacted for ages, online, and Yu Fung is looking for a part-time boyfriend with a similar appearance to him. Sau-shing arbitrarily approaches applicant Mo Kei-nam (also Joe Ma), who is a dead ringer for him. The duo also covertly agree to swap identities for two weeks.

programme.title: Men Don't Cry - EP 19
programme.desc: With the support of the head of the Police Authority, Guangzhou’s top villain HO KEI-KIN (Wong Tze Wah) has been riding roughshod over everyone around him. He is so manipulative that he has explored every possible means in his fight for a house with the buck-toothed owner LING YUK-TSUI (Cecilia Yip). TSUI is happy to have met the upright and honorable WONG FEI-HUNG (Lam Kar Wah). The pair quickly falls in love and even feels ready for marriage.

programme.title: Greed Of Man, The - EP 4
programme.desc: Honest broker Sun (Lau Chung Yan) had known Hai (Adam Cheng) for over ten years. However, Hai accidentally killed Sun and escaped to Taiwan, leaving Sun’s four children fatherless. Sun’s girlfriend then strove to bring up the children. Ten years later, the eldest son, Pok (Lau Ching Wan), finally grew up. However, he was very lazy. Sun’s friend, Tin (Law Lok Lam), then helped him and gradually, he did gain some achievements.

Sun’s girlfriend then strove to bring up the children. Ten years later, the eldest son, Pok (Lau Ching Wan), finally grew up. However, he was very lazy. Sun’s friend, Tin (Law Lok Lam), then helped him and gradually, he did gain some achievements.

programme.title: KUNG FU MASTER, THE - EP 4
programme.desc: During the Ching Dynasty under the throne of Hong Hei, there was a `Kung Fu Contest`, once the sensation of the martial world. NGAU FEI (KWOK JING HUNG) represents the Manchu tribe while TAM TIN (YUEN WAH) represents the Han Tribe. The balance of power was destroyed when TIN was being set up during the competition. TIN lost in the contest. TIN`s father was so irritated that he died throwing up blood. Since then TIN is very depressed and pessimistic. He becomes a coward.

programme.title: Fly With Me - EP 23
programme.desc: LEUNG HAU-CHI (Choi Siu Fun, Ada), a career woman in her 30s, has all the attributes of a typical Hong Kong girl - fussy, arrogant and easily irritated by the sight of beautiful young ladies. She is desperate for love and has been eagerly waiting for the thrilling miracles of life. As CHI is plunged into misery and despair, something strange happens and leads to her abrupt transformation into a superwoman of charm and immense strength.

programme.title: Stranger Anniversary - EP 14
programme.desc: A "doppelgangers" website has facilitated the connection between two complete strangers that look like identical twins. Law firm partner Ko Sau-shing (Joe Ma) tracks down his former lover Yu Fung (Roxanne Tong), whom he has not contacted for ages, online, and Yu Fung is looking for a part-time boyfriend with a similar appearance to him. Sau-shing arbitrarily approaches applicant Mo Kei-nam (also Joe Ma), who is a dead ringer for him. The duo also covertly agree to swap identities for two weeks.

programme.title: Men Don't Cry - EP 20
programme.desc: TVB’s across century billion-dollar production shows you the legend of a property giant._x000D__x000D_The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities.

programme.title: Greed Of Man, The - EP 9
programme.desc: Honest broker Sun (Lau Chung Yan) had known Hai (Adam Cheng) for over ten years. However, Hai accidentally killed Sun and escaped to Taiwan, leaving Sun’s four children fatherless. Sun’s girlfriend then strove to bring up the children. Ten years later, the eldest son, Pok (Lau Ching Wan), finally grew up. However, he was very lazy. Sun’s friend, Tin (Law Lok Lam), then helped him and gradually, he did gain some achievements.

programme.title: Hong Kong Playboys
programme.desc: Sheng is a rich playboy who lives a carefree and fun life with the ladies, until his mother decides that he should get married. Up against other lady killers in his quest to find Miss Right, Sheng must decide what he wants.

programme.title: Forest of Death
programme.desc: This movie is adapted from a Japanese legend. A group of young people come together for a special investigation on the mysterious signals transmitted from the forest that would lure people in to commit suicide.

programme.title: The Truth: Final Episode
programme.desc: Raymond's lawyer licence is suspended as he has prevented the course of justice to clear his mother's conviction. He is subsequently framed for murder with every piece of evidence pointing towards him. The only one with proof of his innocence is his dying mother, who fights to stay alive long enough to exonerate her son before it is too late.

programme.title: On the Edge
programme.desc: Hai Sheng has been an undercover agent for eight years. After arresting the head of a criminal gang, he finally sheds his undercover life and resumes the life of a police officer. However, he finds his current life even tougher as he is not trusted by his colleagues, dumped by his girlfriend and pursued by criminals.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husband's mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price...

programme.title: The Exodus
programme.desc: A low-ranking cop discovers a group of women, including his superior, Madam Fang and his wife, plotting to eliminate the world of men.

programme.title: Frugal Game
programme.desc: How do you overcome unemployment, divorce and crippling debt? Diana and Wai start a fake family to join a frugal game show on TV. To stimulate ratings, the producer forces the director, Tsui, to twist the game from an encouraging environment to a torturing one. As the fake family gets close to the prize, Tsui comes up with some bad ideas...

programme.title: Doubles Cause Troubles
programme.desc: Two squabbling cousins find themselves in more trouble than they can imagine after their tenant ends up dead. The gangsters and the police are both after them, and they have no idea what they have done wrong!

programme.title: The Flying Mr. B
programme.desc: Mr. Shi, a secondary PE teacher, accidentally takes a "super pill" invented by the science teacher and gains superpower, turning into Mr. B. He uses his superpower to help the school sports team win the championship and prevent crimes. When the triad is made aware of Mr. B's superpower, they try to gain the super pill for nefarious purposes.

programme.title: Long Arm of the Law Part 3
programme.desc: Chinese ex-soldier Li is wrongly accused and seeks refuge in Hong Kong to escape a death sentence. En route, he meets Sam and Moon. While Li has fallen in love with Moon, Hong Kong triad kidnaps Moon and coerces Li into aiding a robbery. Meanwhile, the mainland police officer tracks Li's path to Hong Kong, intensifying the chase.

programme.title: Expect The Unexpected
programme.desc: As the OCB team tracks down three amateur thieves who robbed a jewellery store, they encounter the wanted ferocious gangsters and hunt both down at the same time. The team celebrates their success when the gangsters are caught in a fierce battle, but it is at this time that the amateur thieves on the run show up and something unexpected happens...

programme.title: Don't Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A cop has the ability to see ghosts, which is something that has been passed down from generation to generation in his family. He must learn how to manage this gift when he is confronted by the ghost of a notorious criminal whom he has shot.

programme.title: Challenge of the Gamesters
programme.desc: A gambling master and his partner are hired by the government to investigate another gambler who may be working as a Japanese spy in Shanghai.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddy's career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation...

programme.title: Happy Family
programme.desc: Sang, the only son of a rich family, falls in love with Kaka. They plan to get married, but Sang's father stops him from marrying her because she is his half-sister. Later, Sang falls in love with another girl who turns out to be his half-sister too. With Sang devastated, his mother unveils yet another big secret...

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Swindler Master Wong has cheated Pauline's father of his lifetime savings and Pauline vows to bring him to justice. On the way to find Wong, Pauline befriends a young conman and teams up with him to set up a perfect plot to scam Wong. Will their plan succeed and can she uphold justice in the end?

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Mun undergoes a cornea transplant to correct her blindness, but ends up gaining more than the gift of sight. She shockingly realises that she is seeing another woman instead of herself whenever she looks into a mirror. Recalling that things changed ever since her cornea was replaced, Mun vows to uncover the truth behind her strange vision...

programme.title: Behind the Yellow Line
programme.desc: A fresh graduate, Paul, strikes up an acquaintance with a pretty young girl, Monica, on the metro. Monica is involved in a love affair with a married man while Paul is also pursued by a rich girl. When Paul vows his true love for Monica, she suggests playing hide-and-seek with him in the metro to decide if they are fated to be together.

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Two private detectives want to gain fame by solving a series of robberies. However, they were fooled by the King of Thieves during the investigation. It was later discovered that all the robberies were related to a Japanese businessman, Miyamoto. Who is the real King of Thieves?

programme.title: The Eye 10
programme.desc: This third installment of 'The Eye' horror movie series is about the creepy adventures of a group of teenagers who summon spirits by using the ten methods outlined in a mysterious comic book while vacationing in Thailand.

programme.title: Dry Wood Fierce Fire
programme.desc: Alice works for a women's magazine and falls for Ryan, who is hired to run the men's magazine, both owned by magazine tycoon Michelle. Ryan only has eyes for Michelle and Alice tries to hide her true feelings to help him win Michelle.

programme.title: Girl with the Diamond Slipper
programme.desc: An aspiring TV actress gets into hot water when a stolen diamond is hidden in the shoes she bought for a party.

programme.title: City of Desire
programme.desc: Sister 13 returns to Macau after 17 years to succeed her father's underground empire, the prostitution business. She tries to stop their exploitation of the sex workers, but Macau's economy flourished after the handover, propelling the prostitution and gambling businesses. The city is blinded by desire and Sister 13 can do nothing to help...

programme.title: The Story Of My Son
programme.desc: Li attempts to make a fortune at the horse-racing tracks, but is subsequently entangled with loan sharks. Li becomes debt-laden while his sons are harassed by debt collectors, when more heart-wrenching events begin to unfold.

programme.title: Face to Face
programme.desc: Tamotsu dies in a skiing accident and his roommate Yoshio marries his wife as well as inherits his entire fortune. At Tamotsu's funeral, Yoshio sees a badly disfigured old man and that is only the beginning of an evil downfall for him...

programme.title: Bullet and Brain
programme.desc: Nine years ago, two legendary criminals, Bullet and Brain, vowed not to kill and lie before they disappeared. Both now return for a mission - to protect the granddaughter of the triad boss. Can they succeed without breaking their vows?

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 3
programme.desc: Gambling tycoon Man suddenly marries his new partner Sophie, which shocked his only son, Ken. In the wake of Man's heart attack, Ken must battle Sophie - who has persuaded Man to transfer his grand master title to her in the event of his death - for the rightful claim to the family's gambling business in a riveting game of mahjong.

programme.title: Dream Lover
programme.desc: Ka Shing meets Kitty one day and they fall quickly in love. However, Kitty disappears shortly and when they meet years later, she is already married. To comfort himself, Ka Shing asks a mystic master to let Kitty appear in his dreams so that he can be with her constantly, even though she can only be his dream lover...

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: The Fighting Fool
programme.desc: Famous Kung Fu Pole master Red Eagle, is kidnapped by a villain one day. His disciple Meng, vows to rescue him. On his way, Meng encounters a greedy but great martial artist who agrees to join him in the rescue. Even though the two have extremely different personalities, they manage to team up and fight the villain in a final showdown.

programme.title: The Comedy of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sister's wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: Twin Blades Of Doom
programme.desc: A retired martial artist is forced to return with a vengeance after his family and friends are murdered by the evil Ghost Gang. He decides to challenge the gang's leader to a deadly duel so as to take revenge. Can he defeat the ruthless leader in the end?

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people's livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: Heroes Of Sung
programme.desc: Heroes Of Sung stars one of the original kung fu ladies of the silver screen, Shih Szu, who plays swordswoman Meng Hung. She must work with Fan Tien-Fu, played by Lo Lieh to find and protect the royal seals of the Sung Dynasty. Shih's magnificent performance earned her the female hero role in another hit Dracula And The 7 Golden Vampires.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demon's clutches.

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Ling Hsiao and Kuan Wang Lung are two guard chiefs working for an old convoy master. Lung is secretly in love with Fang Yen, the master's granddaughter but Yen is attracted to Ling Hsiao instead. In order to win her back, Lung sets up a trap to steal the convoy and frames Ling Hsiao for it.

programme.title: Lover's Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a man's role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: Pursuit
programme.desc: This movie tells the tale of Lin Chong, the Sung Dynasty's Chief Army Instructor who is framed by a corrupt official and has to embark on an exile fraught with danger. Helped by a monk, Lin Chong is finally able to take revenge.

programme.title: The Dragon Missile
programme.desc: Sima works for a corrupt lord Qin who is suffering from a deadly disease that only a special herb can cure. Qin sends him on an urgent mission to retrieve it, but the task is made more difficult when Sima has to fight off other martial artists who want to steal the cure away from him. He has to fight with his ultimate weapon, the Dragon Missile!

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: Poor student Lin is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises him because of his family's declining status. Lin visits his fiancee before leaving for the Imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lin's bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: In the Yuan Dynasty, martial artists everywhere battle for the Heaven Sword and the Dragon Sabre, as only when these two powerful weapons combine can a secret be revealed to help one become the king of the martial arts world. As Zhang Wu Ji acquires the skills from "Nine Yang Scriptures" by chance, he is also embroiled in this lengthy battle.

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: Finger of Doom
programme.desc: The protagonists are ex-swordmasters who now find joy in making umbrellas. They track down the evil Madame Kung Sun and her poisonous "Finger of Doom", a unique supernatural power which allows her to transform normal, everyday people into horrifying zombies, and this is just the start of their mythical adventure against this zombie maker!

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her father's towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: Invincible Enforcer
programme.desc: A young man is at the wrong place at the wrong time. As he offends a police inspector, he is thrown into jail and even when released, the police goes after him until he has no choice but to become a real criminal. Only a kind and beautiful probation officer is on his side, but can she help him?

programme.title: Hell Has No Boundary
programme.desc: Cheng Chung (Derek Yee) and May (Liu Hsueh-hua), a pair of lovers working on the police force, camp on an outlying island. Awakened by a strange sound, May goes out onto the beach where a violent frenzy grips her. After her return from leave, May insists Inspector Wang (Yueh Hua) in a bid to rescue some hostages. She shoots the thug under most peculiar circumstances. Then a series of tragedies occur.

programme.title: Tales of a Eunuch
programme.desc: Tales Of A Eunuch reunites the potent mix of martial arts superstar Gordon Liu, who plays Emperor in cognito Kang Hsi, with the kung-fu comedienne Wang Yu, an anti-Ching revolutionary. It is a film laced with wild barrages of excellent martial arts chiefly choreographed by Yuen Hua and Yuan Pien; Jackie Chan's long-time kung-fu classmates. At one time, Wang was considered to be the next Alexander Fu Sheng.

programme.title: The Chinese Boxer
programme.desc: A Japanese karate master and Diao Er, who has been expelled from his martial arts school, return to the school to kill the school master and his disciples. After the massacre, disciple Lei Ming embarks on a vigorous training regime and vows to avenge their deaths. A fatal battle is about to begin...

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: The Boxer From The Temple
programme.desc: A young monk, The Kid, was expelled from the temple due to his crazy ways. After leaving the temple, he fights a cruel bandit's son and befriends a prostitute. As he fights for justice, his "Crazy Lo Han Fist" improves with every fight.

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: What Price Honesty
programme.desc: In this period martial arts thriller, three police graduates are assigned to a town rife with crimes and corruption. They vow to uphold justice but are hampered by their corrupt superior, resulting in them putting their lives and the lives of their beloved in danger.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: Village of Tigers
programme.desc: The devilish residents of the Village of Tigers, led by Hu Jiao, plan to kill Lo Hong Shun, otherwise known as the heroic Sword of the Southern Sky. Hu Jiao sees a way to use the righteousness of the honorable Ba family to help him kill the hero Lo by turning them against him. Will good prevail over evil?

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: The Lovers Blades, a pair of invincible weapons, are to be delivered to the Qing Emperor. However, they accidentally fell into the hands of Xiao Zhong Hui and Yuan Guan Nan, so Imperial Chief Zhuo Tian Xiong hunts them down for the blades. As the battle begins, the secret of the blades are also revealed.

programme.title: Perils Of The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: The titanic team of Director Chu Yuan and Novelist Ku Lung chose to give their hero (Ti Lung) a whole new cliffhanger-fraught adventure featuring a mysterious swordsman, a sensual swordswoman, an imperial assassin, a ghost mansion, a booby-trapped tunnel, as well as double crosses and secret missions.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: Shao Kang's War Room
programme.desc: Shao Kang's War Room is a Talkshow hosted by Zhao Shao Kang. This programme combines TVBS News source and Mr. Zhao's rich political and media background, to analyse important news deeply.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: DP World Tour 2025 (Live)
programme.desc: The Italian Open is the men's national open golf championship of Italy. It was founded in 1925. The format of the Italian Open is a standard stroke play event played over 72 holes with a cut after 36 holes. The last Italian man to win his national championship is Francesco Molinari, who did so in 2006 and 2016, but he is the only local winner since 1980.

programme.title: DP World Tour 2025 (Live)
programme.desc: The Italian Open is the men's national open golf championship of Italy. It was founded in 1925. The format of the Italian Open is a standard stroke play event played over 72 holes with a cut after 36 holes. The last Italian man to win his national championship is Francesco Molinari, who did so in 2006 and 2016, but he is the only local winner since 1980.
